animeDescription: The digital sale/airing of the Chain Chronicle: Haecceitas no Hikari movies includes its own unique version of the Chain Chronicle chibi shorts, different from the chibi shorts shown with the theater airing. Their focus is on the female cast.
animeRelated: ['Parent story: Chain Chronicle: Haecceitas no Hikari Part 1', 'Other: Chen-Kuro Gakuen']
